info.+content: La leyenda de Kimba, el León Blanco
Una giungla di avventure per Kimba

The series follows the adventures Leo (renamed Kimba in the English release), a young lion cub. Leo becomes king of the jungle when his father, the previous king of the jungle is killed by a human hunter.
1965-11-10 (Completion of English Dubbing on First/Pilot Episode)
"Jungle Taitei no Theme" (ジャングル大帝のテーマ) by Tadahiko Hirano
"Kimba the White Lion" by Bill Giant [English dub]
"Leo no Uta" (レオのうた) by Mieko Hirota
ジャングル大帝 – 虫プロダクション株式会社
ジャングル大帝：アニメ・映像wiki：TezukaOsamu.net(JP) 手塚治虫 公式サイト
